channel.title: Funniest ban appeal i could send
channel.description:
Ok well after downloading my autotalker I decied to spend a little time in Varrock World one advertising by saying this-
Go to this site- moparthebest.com for all the latest autoers
well know I am permently muted so I though why not send in an appeal with soem of the funniest reason that it wasn't me.
NOW I HAVE JUST RELIZED THOUGH AFTER LETTING THAT AUTO TALKER RUN FOR AN HOUR I DIDN'T EVEN GIVE THE CORRECT ADRESS TO THIS SITE!!I AM AN IDIOT HUH :mad:
(I will post what they send back to me later)

item.title: Funniest ban appeal i could send
item.dc:creator: @Time Time
item.description:
@Time wrote:

Hi Jagex I’m here to recover my banned account. K so I haxxored the army nuclear war weapons shit, I accidently bombed something and so then they haxxored me and key logged me. They stole my password and autoed my account as a punishement for haxxoring them. So then I was like uber mad so I called my friend Osama binfagget who made these uber leet airplanes crash and destroy the world. Now I still dont have my account banned or the army dead. Could you please just like unban me you n00bz0r non-l33t nerd?

PS: Bann zezima because he has no life and is osama binfaggen. =]

Read full topic

item.title: Funniest ban appeal i could send
item.dc:creator: @1337_noob 1337_noob
item.description:
@1337_noob wrote:

those suck il give u a good 1

dear fagex omg u guys are teh nubzors if ur ganna ban me for auto talking will u ban ur mom for talking all night l0ng sh3s being such a noob i would like to say i am going to kill my self becouse runescape is my life and i play evry day and masterbate 2 rune 2hs becouse they are uber 1337 if u dont unban me now im ganna make evry 1 quit and play WoW becouse it is like a haxing game that u can be like SUPER UBER NOW IM TALKING IN CAPS BECOUSE I AM SO ANGRY WTF MY TALKER WONT SHUT OFF BRB…OK ALL BETTER HAD 2 SHUT OF SCAR AND R-BOT THERE ANOYYING ME ALL MY ACCOUNTS DIED LAST NIGHT AT WILLOWS TRYIN 2 GET LIKE 9 ACCS 75+ WC THEN AUTO AT MAGICS AND OWN THEM TREES SO WILL YOU PLS ANAL RAPE ME IF U DO I WILL TELL U WERE OSAMA IS BECOUSE HE IS IN MY CLOSIT AND IM LIKE OMG UR 7"2 AND NO ONE CAN FIND U,WELL REALY I AUTOD AND U SHOULD UNBAN ME BECOUSE ITS NOT NICE AND MY MOM WILL FILE A LAWSUIT ON U BECOUSE U GUYS TOLD ME TO KILL MYSELF SOME KID NAME runescapefan46 was like wtf go kill urself n00b well i like r kellys pee and doo doo butter so im ganna sing my fav song to u i love U U LOVE ME LETS GET 2 GETHER AND HAVE A RAPE PARTY WITH HIV AND AIDS FROM ME 2 U!!! NEXT TIME WONT U WERE A CONDOM.

im fuckin bored…

item.title: Funniest ban appeal i could send
item.dc:creator: @boberick boberick
item.description:
@boberick wrote:

i got 1.

hi jagex wazup? it woznt me dat did dat right? ok?
i was on Wow autoing but thats not against ur rules ok?
then, the auto talked 2 me and went on runescape, it hacked my account and started mining and spamming by itself, i didnt know what 2 do, then, the mouse chased me down the street and all the noobs broke free into flag lane, they wer like animals…
they ALL logged on my acount at the same time and all wrote with auto typers, then hitler came out of the drain and shot me in the head and i died and never wrote this message, so dont ban me, ban all non members and noobs and punch hitler for killing me, i cant type anymore coz i lost half my brain, yours sencerely, auto-cheating boberick2.

Read full topic
item.source: Funniest ban appeal i could send

item.title: Funniest ban appeal i could send
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

hmmmmm just off the top of my head.

oh my gosh you wouldnt believe what happened. I tried to login today cause i was taking the day off school (more on that later) and i was banned. I was like omfg those penors. You see it all started yesterday. I was walking down the road to go to the net cafe to play a bit of WoW when these guys jump out and pull me into this bush by the river. I was like what are you guys doing let me go. They said “NEVER” and they repeadley (sp?) asked for my Runescape Pass. But i remembered those ads you play at the top of the game. And the ads told me to never give out my pass. So this went on for like 10 minutes me refusing to give them my pass. But then Oh my gosh. There was liek 3 of them and they started anal raping me. I held on for like 20 mins of repeated bum sex but i just coulndt hold in and i told them my pass. I cant believe i did it. I should have just taken the pounding. Well anyways so my ass was to sore to go to school today so i think, how about my game of runescape. and then this. And those guys stole my acc just to spam with. Weird huh, Well if you could please give back my Account i would be most grateful thank you.

Read full topic

omg!wtf ander why did you ban my account you emo fagget! It wasnt me! suddam hussein cyber h4Xor3d into my cpu and h4x3d it and ran an auto talk HAPPENING TO SAY go to moparthebest. you all and should suck his p333n0rr yes and that hapens to be my account SO WHAT! hes a l33t cyb3r h4x0r3der and is a fricken leet hacker.that was when the crazy aliens commited statutary rape, and raped me in the bum

thats what i sent.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 09, 2006, 11:12:03 PM[/size][hr]I only had a perment ban. Bet i am purmently banned now…lol it was only a level 3[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @Splid Splid
item.description:
@Splid wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:8, topic:8775”]I had to do a stupid ban appeal cause if ur cool you do it, i have a saved form of it and a screeny of what they sent back, ill show, heres it (pasted)

omg! wtf ander why did you ban my account you emo fagget! It wasnt me! suddam hussein cyber h4Xor3d into my cpu and h4x3d it and ran an auto talk HAPPENING TO SAY lemon boy1 rules you all and should suck his p333n0rr yes and that hapens to be my account SO WHAT! hes a l33t cyb3r h4x0r3der and is a fricken leet hacker! and then when i started mining alot of iron ore, that was when the crazy aliens commited statutary rape, and raped me in the bum and mouth while suddam hax0red the account more!

unban and unmute my account andrew you fuckin emo fag or ill fuck up rs and hax0r it to death[/quote]

Lol, i’ve seen the screenshot of the reply jagex sent you, its so funny. One of the only things that made me laugh on this forum. (Apart from the fat kid that posted 2 pics of himself). I think i saw the screeny somewhere on here.

item.title: Funniest ban appeal i could send
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Congrats on spamming our web adress, now we will have 4593485 more people asking how to run moparscape / asking what ‘javac’ is.

[quote=“Splid, post:5, topic:8775”]It wasnt me that did it. I was watching tv when all of a sudden lightning hit my house and it sucked me into the tv making the people come out of the tv. And them horrible people (the cast from Lost) ran the autotalker. I think Sayid ran the autotalker while Hurley pigged out in the kitchen.

I’m pretty sure Jagex will fall for it, if not, just say you are a member of the Knights of Nii, and you will say Nii if they do not unban the account. (Jagex loves monty python)[/quote]

I like lost.
